Html: This is a breaking change described here. You have to seperate those files into different projects to be working again.

I think there should be option to turn off this behaviour. In my case I have several files with resources based on language. For example Resources.en.ts, Resources.de.ts, Resources.cs.ts, where all contains class "Resources" and concrete file is selected base on user language.
Currently I have to have for every new language project.
